page.description: The O directive allows you to format dynamic text. When you have multiple directives in a Format string, you separate them with semi-colons ";".

argument.name: B={}
argument.description: Character. Specifies background colors. Refer to Dynamic Text O Directive {B} Operator.

argument.name: C={}
argument.description: Character. Specifies foreground colors. Refer to Dynamic Text O Directive {C} Operator.
